讇字的基本解释

讇
chǎn
古同“谄”，谄媚：“颂而无讇。”
说梦话。

讇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chǎn］
［《廣韻》丑琰切，上琰，徹。］
同“諂1”。

讇字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　讇； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1186第08
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?丑琰切，覘上聲。【說文】諛也。【玉篇】佞也。【禮·少儀】爲人臣下者，頌而無讇。【前漢·五行志】不知誰主爲佞讇之計。又【劉輔傳】朝廷無讇諛之士。【師古註】讇，古諂字。　又【集韻】余廉切，音鹽。過恭也。【禮·玉藻】立容辨?無讇。【鄭註】謂傾身以自下也。　又【集韻】時占切，音蟾。【類篇】寐言也。

考證：〔【禮·少儀】爲人臣下者，有頌而無讇。〕　謹照原文頌上省有字。
讇字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
讇字的起名意思

暂无。

Confuse
chǎn
Gu Tong is "flattering" and flattering: "Song but no confession."
Talking in sleep.

[①]［chǎn］
["Guangyun" ugly Yan cut, upper Yan, thorough. ]
Same as "flattering 1".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　讇; Kangxi strokes: 23; Page number: page 1186 08
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Ugly Yan cut, Zang on sound. [Said Wen] Flattery. 【Jade articles】Ning Ye. 【Ritual·Shao Yi】Those who are ministers will sing without embarrassment. [Former Han·Five Elements] I don’t know who is the mastermind. Also【Liu Fu Chuan】The court has no flattering people. [Shigu Note] Gu, ancient flattery words.　[Jiyun] Yu Lianqie, sound and salt. Christine too. 【Rite·Yuzao】Distinguish the standing capacity? No mistake. [Zheng's Note] It is said that leaning in to get down.　 [Ji Yun] Shi Zhanqi, Yin Chan. 【Classes】Mingyan also. Textual research: [[Ritual·Shaoyi] Those who are ministers, there is eulogy but no confession. 〔〕 　 I would like to eulogize the above words according to the original text.
